messages.message:
Hi team, We are facing an issue at JPMC with refiner UI. Do we have any workaround for this?
cc @tamir @vp

Hey @Sujith, can you split it up into multiple refiners chained together? Afaik there's no way to get around this limit, and I'd be concerned about performance if we went above 400 fields. Maybe @danny.lan or @lydia have other ideas.
The recommendation is to split into multiple refiners. We don't support more than 400 fields
